TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A substance that is being studied in the treatment of cancer. It belongs to the family of drugs called ErbB receptor tyrosine kinase inhibitors.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Sustancia en estudio para el tratamiento del cáncer. Pertenece a la familia de medicamentos conocidos como inhibidores del receptor tirosina–cinasa del ErbB.
